main.title: Form Builder - Create Custom Forms Online
main.description: Create, share and manage professional online forms. Browse our collection of public form templates and customize them to match your specific needs. Start building your forms today!

signin.title: Sign In to Form Builder
signin.description: Access your Form Builder account to manage your forms and templates. Create and customize forms with our intuitive builder.

signup.title: Create Form Builder Account
signup.description: Join Form Builder to start creating professional online forms. Get access to templates, form management tools, and more.

dashboard.title: Form Builder Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your forms, view submissions, and access form templates. Control all aspects of your forms from one central location.
